purpose: Enhance AI program performance by optimizing execution quality, speed, and cost.
principle: Utilizes autotuning techniques for AI workflows, leveraging LangChain, LangGraph, and DSPy.
reusability: Offers a framework for integrating and optimizing various AI workflows and agents with support for LangChain, LangGraph, and DSPy.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have stability issues and limited documentation.
name: cognify
description: Multi-Faceted AI Agent and Workflow Autotuning. Automatically optimizes LangChain, LangGraph, DSPy programs for better quality, lower execution latency, and lower execution cost. Also has a simple agent/workflow framework
highlight: Automatically optimizes AI workflows for better quality, lower latency, and cost efficiency.
